# Problem Framing â€” Sales Dataset

## Business Problem
The business wants to understand and improve sales performance.

## ML Formulation
Regression problem.

## Target Variable
Sales amount.

## Features (Inputs)
City, date, historical sales.

## Success Metric
Mean Absolute Error (MAE).

## What ML Will NOT Solve
- Why customers buy
- Impact of marketing campaigns
- Sudden market changes

## Human Role
- Validate predictions
- Adjust for business context
- Decide actions
